articles.title: NCAA won’t allow athletes or athletic department staff to bet on pro sports amid gambling scandals
articles.description:
The move follows a string of high-profile gambling cases that have raised questions about the integrity of competition in college and pro sports.

articles.title: Josh Allen’s inconsistencies persist in loss at Houston, as Bills slip further out of AFC East race
articles.description:
